channel.title: Risk on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Risk on FinanClub

item.title: AGL
item.description: score:85 Chances: Agilon Health has created an agilon Platform, a Total Care Model for community-based physicians, which could drive positive growth for the company. The firm’s focus exclusively on Medicare and management of comprehensive healthcare needs through subscription-like arrangements with health plans or directly with CMS shows potential for consistent revenue generation.

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:147 Chances: Medical Properties Trust is making progress on its plan to get back on solid ground. The company has delivered FFO and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023. Healthcare REITs have emerged as the new leader among REITs, which could be a positive indicator for Medical Properties Trust.
